markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 634 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

A mental effect can alter the target's mind. It has no effect on an object or a [mindless](/Traits.aspx?ID=108) creature.
name: Mental
